IF (OBJECT_ID('faculties_has_enrollees') IS NULL) BEGIN CREATE TABLE faculties_has_enrollees ( faculty_id BIGINT NOT NULL, enrollee_id BIGINT NOT NULL, filing_date DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT GETDATE(),
CONSTRAINT PK_faculties_has_enrollees PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (faculty_id, enrollee_id),
CONSTRAINT FK_faculties_has_enrollees_faculty_id FOREIGN KEY (faculty_id) REFERENCES faculties (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
CONSTRAINT FK_faculties_has_enrollees_enrollee_id FOREIGN KEY (enrollee_id) REFERENCES enrollees (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) END
